Class MapXML

java.lang.Object
com.simulus.io.MapXML
public class MapXML extends Object
Used by the Simulus suite of applications, (MainApp) and the Editor (EditorApp), for import and export of a Simulus map file. XML data format used.

  • Method Details

    • readXML

      public void readXML(File inputFile)
      Reads a Simulus XML map file and returns 2D array of type Tile. Error thrown if map file does not match expected schema
      Parameters:
      inputFile - the input map file to be read

    • readXML

      public void readXML(String filePath)
      Reads a map file using the file location
      Parameters:
      filePath - the full path to the source map file

    • writeXML

      public void writeXML(Tile[][] gridIn, String outputFile, String nameIn, String dateIn, String descIn, String authIn, int canvasSizeIn, int numOfTilesIn, boolean validatedIn)
      Outputs a map file based on given 2D array of type tile plus metadata.
      Parameters:
      gridIn - the 2D array of tiles representing a grid
      outputFile - the destination file where the map will be saved
      nameIn - the map name
      dateIn - the date and time the map was last saved
      descIn - a description for the map
      authIn - the author of the map
      canvasSizeIn - the canvas size of the map (800 pixels)
      numOfTilesIn - the height of the map grid in terms of cells. Grid height = width
      validatedIn - has the map been validated i.e. passed to be used with the simulator

    • getTileGrid

      public Tile[][] getTileGrid()
